name: Formula 1
description: A high-speed international motorsport featuring open-wheel racing cars competing in grand prix events worldwide.

name: Tennis
description: A racket sport played individually or in doubles on a rectangular court divided by a net.

name: UFC
description: Ultimate Fighting Championship, a mixed martial arts competition featuring fighters from various disciplines.

name: Soccer
description: Also known as football, a team sport where two teams compete to score goals by getting the ball into the opposing team's net.

name: Basketball
description: A team sport where two teams try to score points by shooting a ball through a hoop elevated ten feet above the ground.

name: Volleyball
description: A team sport where two teams separated by a net try to score points by grounding a ball on the other team's court.

name: Hockey
description: A sport in which two teams use sticks to hit a puck or ball into the opponent's goal to score points.
